Packages that use ezxpns.GUI

Classes in ezxpns.GUI used by ezxpns
CategoryHandlerInterface
          Interface to handle the categories between the Graphical User Interface and the data storage (upon GUI Exit)
RecordHandlerInterface
          To handle the records between the Graphical User Interface and the data storage (upon GUI Exit)
SearchHandlerInterface
          This interface denotes the possible searches the user may do as well as assists the UI side
in disseminating the search request, and returning formatted, relevant search results
back to the UI component.
SearchRequest
          Wrapper class to contains search query parameters
May support multiple queries (future iterations)
but not handled in the master class for now.
